comment.author: 54708393@N08
comment._content: Is that the same little lady as in the previous Powers posting.Maybe a member of the family?.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: Yes!! The prize of (virtual) Christmas pudding goes to [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54708393@N08] !! It is the same girl, as suggested before - maybe a daughter of the Powers... Either way, it allows us to date Hamburg! Urgent! to 1929, rather than somewhere between 1926 and 1939... :)
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Rather an odd outfit for the driver.  No wonder he looks out of sorts.  First thing I thought when I saw the young lady was that we had seen her before in the Hamburg Urgent shot but I had been away working and had not see todays posts.  She is dressed up all fancy in this one but she still looks very pretty.  As regards the trees morrisoxfordV there are a  variety of trees for the good reason that Powers sold seeds and trees!

comment.author: 54708393@N08
comment._content: I eagerly await the pudding in my email.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54708393@N08] Just emailed! Hope the virtual Christmas Pudding prize doesn't get squished while hurtling through the interweb...  :)

comment.author: 10957255@N08

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: The man's shoe looks torn right near the sole, suggesting he isn't being paid enough to keep himself well.  Maybe his expression is one of class resentment?

comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content:
Looking a little closer at this I think the photo was being prepared for hand colouring hence the white clothing and horses reins. This might have been for a promotional calendar or some other form of advertising.
I'm pretty certain this was taken at the side of the Courthouse.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/33577523@N08] Thanks, Paul! Have added this one to the map now. And good thinking on the hand colouring...
